coloredTexts.text: By gathering Creeper Spores and Gold Bars you can make an armor that is highly resistant to explosions.
The sharp teetch of the Shield of The Deep inflicts bleed on creatures that hit it.
I heard that Anna Warhammer fought the Void. A formidable blacksmith, I admire her.
The Nether is a good place to find rare minerals, but it is dangerous.
Greetings adventurer, you have excellent quality equipment. Who is the blacksmith?
Sorry, after the big war it's hard to trade, we need everything.
If I find armor harder than mine then I'll eat my boots, haha.
